output_list.reason: The transferMulti function has an integer overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The freeze function is called by the unfreeze function, which paradoxically freezes the user first and then unfreezes him.
The airdrop function uses the random() function, which generates non-random tokens for a period of time, increasing the chance of an attacker winning.
The contract address is set as the owner, allowing unauthorized users to perform airdrop and generate tokens.
The Token contract has a non-variable owner, allowing the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
